revised_title: Paramagnetic and Diamagnetic Conditions of Arterial and Venous Blood
tldr: The author investigates the magnetic properties of arterial and venous blood, finding that arterial blood exhibits paramagnetic behavior while venous blood demonstrates diamagnetic properties. The experiments involve suspending blood samples in a magnetic field and observing their orientation and movement, providing insight into the role of oxygen and carbon dioxide in blood's magnetic properties.
